channel.title: Logging on the client
channel.description: Hey im using this client:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512086.0.html And everytime i give the link to someone they download the client which takes seconds? and then what they do run the client, it says Downloading cache and it'll freeze at doing so at 10% or 7% the max it ever went is 37% pleaseee help? I think i need to add the cache or source thing with the download correct me if im wrong, and does anyone a good website host which is free or so?

item.title: Logging on the client

@kronixz wrote:

there is only one cache folder

item.description:

Okay, but what cache do i put with it? this is what im confused on.
why would you unrep me? i was just asking a question which you didnt even answer thanks alot fag.

item.title: Logging on the client
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

you have to move your cache to the C:\ drive.
